text:
i think it happens to pages that are children of the current one.
check it out on zones:
* publish the index page. you will be warned about concepts and tutorials not
being published.
* now publish the resource type examples page. no warning about the unpublished
links.
creator: nettings@apache.org

text:
The link syntax in the example content was invalid, so the links were not
transformed to UUIDs and the LinkManager didn't recognize them.
creator: andreas@apache.org
